content: The pawns are the soul of chess: it is they alone that determine the attack and the defense, and the winning or losing of the game depends entirely on their good or bad arrangement.
translations: ita:I pedoni sono l'anima degli scacchiï¹• sono loro sole che determinano l'attacco e la difesa, e la vittoria o la sconfitta
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
